}

,0xdb183070066666,0xdb18303c3e6666,0xff18300e666666, 0x7e3c1c7c3c663e

uint64_t sctext[] = { 0xc318000000000000, 0xc318300000000000, 0xc300300000000000, 0xdb38783e3c7c6600, 0xdb18307006666600, 0xdb18303c3e666600, 0xff18300e66666600, 0x7e3c1c7c3c663e00 };
